CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV walks down the hall and stands outside the door to the room . MOT and CHI enter room . CHI goes over to the toys on the floor . INV explains Warm-up task to MOT
INV leaves the room and shuts the door
top half of MOT not in camera view
<bef> CHI walks towards the center of the room and bends over and pushes the toy car
CHI's back is to the camera
top half of MOT still not in camera view
CHI stays squatting on the floor and pushes the toy car with his left hand then tries to push the head of the jack+in+the+box , which is on the floor , back into the box
MOT bends down and sits on floor next to CHI pushing a book on the floor to the side
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box from CHI and begins to push the toy's head back into the box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and looks at CHI
CHI turns towards MOT and leans against her legs while reaching for the jack+in+the+box
MOT looks down at the jack+in+the+box
MOT closes the lid of jack+in+the+box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and looks at CHI
MOT turns the crank handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI continues to reach with his arms towards the jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches out with his hand to touch the head of the toy
MOT pushes the head of jack+in+the+box back into the box
the lid over the head of the jack+in+the+box pops open slightly
<$=1> MOT pushes the head of jack+in+the+box back into the box
MOT holds out the jack+in+the+box and looks at CHI
<aft> MOT turns the crank handle faster than before
CHI turns and looks at the toy car
CHI picks up the toy car near MOT's leg and begins to push the car along the floor
CHI puts down the car and picks up the toy duck near MOT's leg
CHI looks down at the duck
MOT turns the handle one more time
MOT leaves the jack+in+the+box in her lap
MOT looks down at the duck
MOT reaches out with her right hand to take the plastic duck from the CHI
MOT holds the duck up in front of CHI and squeezes the toy so that it squeaks
CHI reaches up for the toy
MOT pulls the duck back out of CHI's reach
MOT moves duck back so CHI cannot get it
MOT looks at CHI and continues to hold duck up out of CHI's reach
<$=1> MOT looks at CHI and continues to hold duck up out of CHI's reach
CHI reaches up for the duck
MOT bends towards CHI and places her face close to CHI's
MOT lets go of the duck
CHI holds the duck in front of him and examines it closely
MOT looks at CHI and makes a squeezing gesture with her hand
CHI looks down at the duck
MOT touches the duck's bill with her finger
CHI looks down at the duck
CHI puts the plastic duck into his mouth
MOT takes hold of CHI's wrist and pulls his hand away from his mouth
CHI looks down at the duck
CHI is holding the duck in one hand
MOT takes the duck from CHI's hand
CHI watches the duck in MOT's hand then looks to MOT's lap
CHI reaches towards the jack+in+the+box which is still on MOT's lap and touches the head of the clown
MOT picks up the toy car and tries to put the plastic duck on top of the car
CHI lets go of the clown and looks down at the car
MOT continues to fumble with the toy car and plastic duck
MOT again picks up the plastic duck and puts it on the toy car
CHI leans back and watches MOT
MOT pushes the car back and forth to the right of her body and is still seated
MOT looks up at CHI and smiles
CHI sits back slightly from MOT and watches her push the car . CHI then leans forward and reaches for the car
MOT pushes the car very close to CHI
MOT pulls the car back pushes car towards CHI and releases the car so that it rolls gently towards CHI
CHI looks up at the wall then sits still looking at the car
CHI takes the duck off the toy car
CHI holds and plays with the duck
<$=1> MOT appears to be buttoning up the legs on CHI's trousers
CHI holds up the duck to MOT
MOT still seems to be fixing CHI's pants somehow
CHI holds the duck up to MOT's face
CHI pulls the duck in towards himself
MOT sits back up straight and looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT then holds the duck out towards her
MOT takes the duck from CHI
MOT bounces duck on her leg
CHI sits back from MOT and watches her briefly then CHI looks at the car
CHI puts his hand on the car and pushes it along the floor next to him
MOT then moves the duck closer to CHI bounces the duck on the floor near CHI
CHI rests his hand on the toy car and looks at it
MOT moves duck up to CHI's hand taps the bill of the duck on the CHI's hand then arm then chest
MOT pretends to kiss CHI with the duck
CHI reaches for his mouth then looks up at MOT then back down at the car
MOT again taps the bill of the duck on CHI's leg then arm then chest moving up the body closer to the face
CHI sits back with hand still near toy car
CHI looks down at the duck and leans over on his side
MOT leans forward towards the car and puts the duck back on top of the car
CHI rolls onto his knees and begins to push the car away from where he sat with MOT crawling towards the door
MOT moves back slightly to watch CHI
MOT reaches out arm towards the toys
CHI stops near the door and sits
CHI looks at the car and duck
<$=1> MOT picks up the duck and places him back onto the car
MOT leans back and watches CHI

CHI pushes the toy car along the floor then rolls it by the door behind MOT's back and runs the car into the base of the wall . CHI holds the car there pressed against the base of the wall for a few seconds
MOT stands up picks up the jack+in+the+box and then sits down in the chair facing CHI at the door . MOT closes the lid to the jack+in+the+box and begins to turn the handle
CHI picks up the toy duck and looks at MOT
CHI begins to stand up and places his hand with the duck in it on the floor to help lift himself
CHI leaves the duck on the floor and walks quickly towards the other side of the room near MOT
MOT places the jack+in+the+box on the floor next to her chair
CHI picks up the football with one hand and holds it in his cocked arm over one shoulder
CHI stands facing towards the door away from MOT
<$=1> MOT holds both hands out palms up towards CHI
CHI throws the ball towards the door
MOT slowly moves both hands palms down so that they both hang between her legs

CHI watches the ball fall onto the floor near the door and then slowly turns to his left away from MOT . CHI stands next to the table with his left arm resting on the edge of the table , his back towards MOT and his sight directed towards the wall
CHI walks out of the camera view
MOT stays seated in chair looking at CHI
CHI points to something on desk
CHI points up at the desk and turns to looks at MOT
CHI attempts to climb on to the chair at the desk
MOT takes CHI's arm to lead him away from the desk and to face him towards the center of the room
CHI leans by the chair watching MOT
MOT holds the ball out in both arms
MOT holding out the ball begins to swing her arms as she counts
CHI looks towards the center of the room
CHI begins to walk off away from MOT
<bef> CHI walks over towards the desk in front of the camera and stops there
CHI points to the floor under the desk and looks at MOT
MOT leans over and looks at CHI
CHI points at something under the table
MOT stands holding the ball with both hands between her legs looking at CHI
CHI looks up at the camera
MOT squats down next to CHI and watches him
CHI points and looks up at the camera then turns and looks at MOT
CHI looks up at the camera smiling
CHI looks up down at the table
CHI looks up at the camera again then off to the side
CHI looks up at the camera
<aft> CHI moves to the right and sits in the small chair
CHI sits back in the chair
CHI looks up at the camera
MOT still squatting holds the ball out slightly towards CHI
INV walks into the room and explains Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves room while Small Scale Activity takes place
INV re-enters the room and has MOT sit next to CHI at the table
INV explains Forbidden Object task to MOT
INV gives CHI the slinky toy
CHI looks at the slinky the watches INV
INV reaches into the drawer of the desk next to her
INV pulls out the Forbidden Object and sets it on the table
CHI stares intently at the object
<$=1> MOT leans towards CHI and places her hand on the table
CHI extends his hand towards the object
CHI pulls his right hand back
CHI pulls his hand away from MOT then points at the object
MOT holds CHI's hand and moves it in an up and down motion
CHI stares at the object and points
<bef> MOT stares at CHI . MOT looks at the object
<bef> MOT stares at CHI . MOT looks at the object
MOT moves CHI's hand bouncing it up and down
MOT remains leaning close to CHI holding his hand
INV puts ball stand toy back into bottom draw of desk next to her
CHI looks down at the slinky on the table
INV explains the PCI interaction boxes to MOT and picks up all the toys from Small Scale Activity . CHI gets out of the chair and MOT begins to walk towards the counter
CHI stands and watches INV leaving
CHI points to the door and looks up at MOT
MOT is mostly out of the camera view but seems to be holding a box
CHI looks at MOT and points up at the box she is holding
CHI looks up at MOT and claps gleefully
<$=1> MOT puts box down in front of CHI and squats on the floor
CHI walks over and puts his hand s on the box
CHI bends over and reaches into the box and takes out the ball
MOT puts box down on the floor near the wall out of the way
<$=1> MOT squats in front of CHI and holds both her hands out and looks at CHI
CHI holds the ball up over one shoulder and faces towards the door away from MOT
MOT holds her hands up looking at CHI
CHI moves the ball over his other shoulder
CHI throws the ball at the door
<bef> CHI looks at MOT . CHI looks at the door
the ball bounces off the door and towards MOT
MOT catches the ball and throws it up into the air two times
CHI turns away from MOT and towards one of the small chairs
CHI starts to climb up on the chair
CHI takes hold of a small chair and starts to drag it towards the desk
MOT holds the ball and looks at CHI
CHI trips and falls towards the counter pulling the chair down with him
CHI stands up and starts to walk away from MOT
<$=1> MOT picks the chair up off the floor
MOT holds the ball and looks at CHI
<aft> MOT rolls the ball along the floor towards the CHI
CHI walks around behind the desk which is in front of the camera
MOT is out of camera view
CHI points up at the computer behind the desk
CHI looks up at the camera and points towards it
<bef> CHI backs up and almost trips . CHI grabs hold of the table
CHI looks up at the camera
CHI points at the computer and looks at MOT
CHI looks at MOT and reaches for the computer
MOT takes CHI's hand and pulls him out from behind the desk
CHI stands in the middle of the room and looks back towards the small desk
CHI walks back to the desk
MOT throws the ball up in the air . She is squatting in the middle of the floor
CHI picks up the chair by the arms and starts to take a step
MOT bounces ball on floor in front of her and then rolls it towards the door
CHI puts the chair back down on the floor
CHI picks up the ball and walks towards the box
CHI puts the ball into the empty box and picks it up and walks towards the table with it
CHI puts the box on the table and starts to walks over to the desk
MOT straightens up on her knees
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT picks up the box with the ball in it and holds it up over her head and shakes the box
MOT lowers the box so that the ball is at CHI's eye level
CHI reaches up for the box
MOT tilts the box so that CHI can see inside
CHI walks up to MOT and holds his hands up reaching toward the open top of the box
MOT holds the box and looks at CHI
CHI reaches into the box and rolls the ball out himself so that it hits his face
MOT smiles and looks at CHI
CHI holds the ball up on his shoulder and walks towards the wall opposite the camera
the ball rolls off the back of CHI's shoulder onto the floor
CHI turns and looks down at the ball
MOT quickly moves towards the ball and picks it up
CHI tries to pick up ball and to take it away from MOT
CHI walks over to the wall
CHI stands facing the wall opposite the camera . CHI holds the ball on his shoulder and looks up at the wall
<$=1> MOT squats on the floor looking up at the wall
<bef> CHI accidentally drops the ball on the floor behind him and then runs after it
CHI looks up into the camera briefly
MOT catches the bouncing ball and hands it to CHI
CHI takes the ball and runs back towards the wall
CHI looks up at the wall
CHI stands and stares at the wall then looks down to the wastebasket on the floor next to the wall
MOT watches CHI and puts her hands out

<bef> MOT blocks the ball from going in
CHI stares down into the wastebasket
CHI tries to pick up the wastebasket
MOT takes CHI's hand and tries to pull him away from the wastebasket
MOT rolls the ball on the floor briefly then picks it up
MOT throws the ball up in the air . <aft> MOT hands the ball to CHI
<bef> CHI bends over the empty box . <aft> CHI stands up and walks over to the wall
MOT puts her hand up to catch the ball
<bef> CHI looks up at the wall holding the ball unsteadily perched on his shoulder . CHI looks at the wastebasket
CHI starts to throw the ball in the wastebasket
MOT again blocks the ball from going into the wastebasket
MOT throws the ball up in the air
CHI runs over to MOT and grabs for the ball
MOT hides the ball behind her back

CHI runs around to MOT's back

CHI tries to grab the ball from MOT's arms

<aft> MOT lets go of the ball
CHI pulls at ball in MOT's arms and finally gets ball
